body.p: Lactose intolerance is caused by insufficient enzyme to digest which kind of organic compound?

response.feedback: Correct. Lactose is a disaccharide of glucose and galactose
Incorrect. The enzyme lactase is a protein, but the lactose it digests is not
Incorrect. Milk does have “milk fats”, but lactose is not one of the triglycerides
Incorrect. The sugars ribose and deoxyribose combine with nucleic acid to form the nucelotides, but lactose is related to nucleic acid

part.hint: Lactose is found in milk products, and is also known as “milk sugar”.
